Sentencas: Fuel cells, as alternatives for conventional energy conversion systems, have the prospect for exploiting fossil fuels (especially natural gas) more benignly and efficiently.
Titulo: Techno-economic assessment of high efficient energy production (SOFC-GT) for residential application from natural gas

Sentencas: High temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) with the ability of direct natural gas reforming is promised to be the most efficient device for a direct conversion of the fuel chemical energy into the electricity.
Titulo: Techno-economic assessment of high efficient energy production (SOFC-GT) for residential application from natural gas

Sentencas: Its efficiency can be further increased up to 70% when the SOFC is coupled with a Gas Turbine (GT) cycle.
Titulo: Techno-economic assessment of high efficient energy production (SOFC-GT) for residential application from natural gas

Sentencas: To provide the required energy for the household application, a kW range SOFC-GT (11-42.9 kWe) combined cycle is proposed in this article.
Titulo: Techno-economic assessment of high efficient energy production (SOFC-GT) for residential application from natural gas

Sentencas: Complete thermodynamic simulation of a SOFC-GT power system is done.
Titulo: Techno-economic assessment of high efficient energy production (SOFC-GT) for residential application from natural gas

Sentencas: Then a four floor building is introduced for energy consumption section.
Titulo: Techno-economic assessment of high efficient energy production (SOFC-GT) for residential application from natural gas

Sentencas: Each floor has the 100 m(2) flat.
Titulo: Techno-economic assessment of high efficient energy production (SOFC-GT) for residential application from natural gas

Sentencas: After calculating the required electrical and thermal load of building, the size of proposed system is determined and the economic evaluation is considered.
Titulo: Techno-economic assessment of high efficient energy production (SOFC-GT) for residential application from natural gas

Sentencas: Four different climatic areas of Iran are selected for this study.
Titulo: Techno-economic assessment of high efficient energy production (SOFC-GT) for residential application from natural gas

Sentencas: The results show that among the selected cities, SOFC-GT is more economic in the hot and wet climate area (Ahvaz).
Titulo: Techno-economic assessment of high efficient energy production (SOFC-GT) for residential application from natural gas

Sentencas: The prime cost of electrical energy per kWh and the period of return is 0.0208 US$ and 8.3494 years respectively in Ahvaz.
Titulo: Techno-economic assessment of high efficient energy production (SOFC-GT) for residential application from natural gas
